function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for asymptomatic periods in disease spread modeling","Impact":"Inaccurate disease spread predictions and ineffective control measures","Mitigation":"Incorporate realistic representations of asymptomatic periods in disease spread models","Technologies":"Advanced disease spread modeling and simulation software","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Neglect of reactive behavior in disease spread modeling","Impact":"Failure to account for human behavior in disease spread scenarios","Mitigation":"Integration of reactive behavior into disease spread models","Technologies":"Behavioral modeling software, machine learning algorithms","People":"Social scientists, epidemiologists, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, urban planning agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of time-varying mobility matrices in disease spread analysis","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease spread patterns and dynamics","Mitigation":"Incorporation of time-varying mobility matrices into disease spread analysis","Technologies":"Big data analytics, spatial modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, urban planners, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
